summary: This is an email chain from March 2021 regarding the organization and tagging of document batches in the 'USvEpstein Relativity' database. The correspondence clarifies the contents of two batches: 'BATCH003 - USAO-SDFL' and 'BATCH004 - OPR Materials', and includes a request to tag a batch as 'Not Epstein Related'.

persons.name: Marie Villatana
